explanation: [0-0] On a football field, a girl with long blonde curly hair wearing an Argentina jersey stands facing left, looking at the field, surrounded by many people also looking at the field.

[0-10] Then the girl claps her hands in front of her body and looks to the right. The camera then switches to a group of people walking towards the front. A man wearing an Argentina jersey walks out of the crowd, shaking his head. He stretches out his arms and hugs the girl with long blonde curly hair and another little girl with two pigtails. Their jerseys have "DI MARIA" printed on the back. The surrounding crowd is swaying.

[30-36] Then the man looks up and kisses the two girls. The girl with long hair turns to the right and touches her nose. The lady loosens her arms, her eyes filled with tears, and stands on the right, holding a handbag. The man smiles and squats down, picking up the little girl. The crowd keeps swaying.
